title: ISimpleHoleFeatureData2.SetDirectionReference
description: Sets the direction of the cut extrude for this simple hole feature.
signature:
System.Boolean SetDirectionReference( 
   System.Object
Ref1
,
   System.Object
Ref2
)
returns: True if the direction for the cut is set, false if not
remarks:
Sometimes one reference entity defines a direction; for example, an edge or axis. Other times, two reference entities define a direction; for example, two vertices or two sketch points.
Valid reference entities for Ref1 and Ref2:
line segment
edge
axis
vertex
face
plane
sketch point
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
